page.title: 11VILLAGERS
page.content: HOMELIFE for Mr & Mrs Elder revolves around their village of St. Margaret's near Gt. Gaddesden.They like it because it is beautiful & quiet.They care about the well-being of their VILLAGE. They are a farming family. The Elders have lived in their house for 46 yrs. It was built by Lord Brownlow in 1876. They have never moved within the area. There are 7 other people in the family; their son, daughter and 5 grandchildren. Mr Tom Elder is 75 years old, but considers himself as an unemployed workman. He does odd jobs & helps on his daughter's FARM which is within walking distance of their home. The Elders are interested in the Buddhist monastery recently established in the village and know many of the monks.He claims the village now has many COMMUTERS and only 2 labourers left.
